title: Demacia background

embed.description: Images of lol and demacia uploaded by Wallyshark

body: A demacia background i made with photoshop. I made it a while back and decided to post it here :) Has Garen's sword, J4's flag, Lux's wand, XinZhao's spear, Valor(quinn)'s wing, Gailo's wing, Poppy's hammer, Taric's shield, and Fiora's family emblem at the back. (i left out sona since i can't really fit the weapon here, and she doesn't look very demacian to me :P)

replies.body:
"and she doesn't look very demacian to me :P"

Her hair color is literally blue and yellow

Her hair color is blue and yellow, but... colors can't make up for the fact that she's not loud. Demacians have to be loud, cocky, or at least be annoying with their voice (Cough, Lux laugh, cough). Sona is all quiet, just strumming her instrument like a quiet Ionian. She... kinda is Ionian though, but brought to Demacia. Sorta why Kayle isn't in there either. She's Demacian, but isn't actually Demacian.

To each thier own, there is nothing wrong with the piece at all
Just I never understood when people get confused on Sona's alliance, her entire color pallet screams "DEMACIAAAA!"

aw this is cute!!

and sona doesn't strike me as very demacian looking either. maybe its because she was born in ionia?
Born in Ionia, Raised in Demacia
